generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Aquatic Charge Attack Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Enables an aquatic mob to dash at its target with knockback; includes overshoot and cooldown settings.

fields.title: Attack Reach
fields.description: Horizontal reach grown around the mob's AABB to register a hit.

fields.title: Charge Cooldown Time
fields.description: Range of time in seconds to wait before starting another charge.

fields.title: Charge Overshoot Distance
fields.description: Distance beyond the target the mob aims during a charge.

fields.title: Charge Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Speed multiplier applied during the charge.

fields.title: Knockback Force
fields.description: Knockback force applied to the target on hit.

fields.title: Max Charge Distance
fields.description: Maximum distance at which the mob attempts a charge.
